Hi Joel,

This happened to me yesterday as well. When I created a new quote, and then added the room, it wouldn't let me add an inventory item

Sophie Bekkeli ASSISTANT TO SENIOR STYLIST

02 9310 1611 | Tenancy 1, Unit 1, 14A Baker Street Banksmeadow NSW 2019

novaricollective.com.au

Hi Joel,

Happy New Year! It's happening again since yesterday. And this time it happens when adding an item. After filling out the first pages, on the "Styling Proposal" page, you need to save, reopen and then you will be able to add an item.



Marc Madayag

We have found the issue and it is now fixed.

Hi Support Team,

Please try filling in the pages first, then try to click the add button. I am able to click the add button but after saving the proposal first.

novaricollective.com.au

Hi Sophie,

We are looking into this. We can't seem to replicate the issue. We are able to press the "Add +" button and it is working fine. 
Would you be able to send what browser and operating system you guys are using that is having an issue?

I fill in "Stylist/Clients Details", then Agent Details, then Install Details, then when I get to the "Styling Proposal" page, I am unable to click "ADD +". I have to save the proposal first and when I open the proposal again, I will be able to add the room. Please see image below.
